0xA3EA2893// GetPedHairColor
int GET_PED_HAIR_COLOR(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: Returns ped's primary hair colour.A getter for _SET_PED_HAIR_COLOR. Returns -1 if fails to get.Examples:Lualocal primaryColour = GetPedHairColor(PlayerPedId())
if primaryColour == 18 then
  print("You have red hair!")
end
